txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Blotchy skins from the beasts in eastern Dunland. Collect them and deliver them to the taskmaster at Forthbrond to earn favour with Théodred's Riders.
'Well, that is a few less beasts stalking after our horses. My thanks to you.'
'There is no shortage of beasts in these wild lands... Keep your eyes open.'
The Rohirrim taskmaster wants blotchy skins. He can be found in the Rohirrim encampment of Forthbrond in the Isendale.
Deliver the blotchy skins to the taskmaster at Forthbrond
You have accepted a task to acquire blotchy skins. You are to deliver them to the Rohirrim taskmaster at Forthbrond.
Wanted: Blotchy skins from the beasts in eastern Dunland.
